DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct 8 rural county Alabama Mississippi ( 4 per state ) . Approximately 400 overweight obese African American woman live select county participate 2-year weight loss study .
DOC.detailed_description: Using cluster-randomized study design , 400 overweight obese African American woman live 8 rural county Alabama Mississippi associate Deep South Network Cancer Control assign either weight loss weight loss plus community strategy condition 2 year . Weight Loss Only condition : In year 1 , participant attend weekly in-person group session ( 1.5 hour ) aim behavioral change weight loss ( diet physical activity ) 6 month follow twice month meeting 3 month , monthly meeting 3 month . In year 2 , monthly phone call use encourage continued behavior change weight maintenance . In-person group meeting facilitate trained lay staff community health advisor . Monthly phone call conduct community health advisor . Weight Loss Plus Community Strategies condition : Participants receive weight loss program Weight Loss Only condition . In addition , community-based organization non-profit group target community receive fund technical assistance implement community-wide effort increase access healthy affordable food safe convenient opportunity physical activity ( e.g. , increase farmer 's market , develop walk trail ) . Over course study , participant complete four full assessment include measurement height weight ( calculate BMI ) , waist circumference , blood pressure , finger-stick blood draw lipid glucose testing , dietary recall , questionnaires concern participation physical activity , self-efficacy eating exercise behavior , depressive symptom , perceive stress , social support , demographic information ( e.g. , age , marital status , education , employment , household income ) .
DOC.criteria: African American female Live work target county BMI > = 25 kg/m2 Pregnant planning become pregnant next year Known major medical psychological condition know influence body weight Uncontrolled hypertension ( BP > 160 mmHg systolic > 100 mmHg diastolic ) Cardiovascular event precede 12 month History gastric bypass surgery History psychiatric hospitalization past 2 year History substance abuse eat disorder Any condition medical professional suggest diet modification Physical activity and/or weight reduction would contraindicate
